text: The University of Antwerp () is a university in Antwerp, Belgium. The university has about 20,000 students. It was founded in 2003. == Other websites == * Category:19th-century establishments in Belgium Category:1850s establishments in Europe Category:1852 establishments Category:2000s establishments in Belgium Category:2003 establishments in Europe Category:Antwerp Antwerp
title: University of Antwerp
